mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts( id, owner, source, customerId, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, birth, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address ) values( #{id}, #{owner}, #{source}, #{customerId}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{email}, #{mphone}, #{job}, #{birth}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editBy}, #{editTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_contacts c join tbl_user u on c.owner = u.id join tbl_customer cu on c.customerId=cu.id
cu.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and c.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and c.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and c.birth like '%' #{birth} '%'

select c.id, u.name as owner, c.source, cu.name as customerId, c.fullname, c.appellation, c.email, c.mphone, c.job, c.birth, c.createBy, c.createTime, c.editBy, c.editTime, c.description, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.address from tbl_contacts c join tbl_user u on c.owner = u.id join tbl_customer cu on c.customerId=cu.id
cu.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and c.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and c.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and c.birth like '%' #{birth} '%'
order by createTime desc limit #{skipCount},#{pageSize}

select c.id, u.name as owner, c.source, cu.name as customerId, c.fullname, c.appellation, c.email, c.mphone, c.job, c.birth, c.createBy, c.createTime, c.editBy, c.editTime, c.description, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.address from tbl_contacts c join tbl_user u on c.owner = u.id join tbl_customer cu on c.customerId=cu.id where c.id=#{id}
